name: A Spring Meal
description:
-Story-

It's Spring! You want to celebrate with a nice Spring Meal. But you don't have any ingredients! Go around town and talk with the townspeople to figure out where to find those delicious ingredients!

-Controls-
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space or Enter to Interact
  • Alt+f4 to Exit
  • TIP, Houses without signs aren't enterable
-Information-

This is my submission to the Great Spring Game Jam 2022 hosted by Firith Studios

The optional theme was Gathering, and I used this theme in the fact that you need to Gather all of the ingredients for your meal.

I also used the optional color palette which was Tofu 20k
